alfredsnippet.snippet:
#1. move pointer 2 step back
git reset --hard HEAD~2
#2. check last commit changes
git show 50695b217330689c0d1e55fd2b6d813406b2cbc2
#3. push my new pointer to git repo, -f force
git push origin gateway-async-priority-fix
#4. then pull master and sync
alfredsnippet.name: git revert last 2 commit remote + local
